70010000115960.description:
Experience the beauty of the year, one puzzle at a time, in Jigsaw Realms: Seasons. This relaxing jigsaw experience features beautifully illustrated scenes inspired by all four seasons, from blooming spring landscapes and sunlit summer fields to colorful autumn vistas and peaceful winter wonderlands.

The game includes 30 handcrafted levels with each puzzle celebrating a different moment of the seasonal cycle. Play using touch controls or controllers, and switch between them anytime for a seamless experience!

Perfect for short, cozy sessions or longer puzzle-solving moments, Jigsaw Realms: Seasons invites you to relax and enjoy the changing world around you.

Features:
> 30 handcrafted jigsaw levels inspired by all four seasons
> Spring, summer, autumn, and winter scenes in a stylized fantasy art style
> Save and resume freely whenever you want
> A calm, cozy experience for all ages
70010000115960.intro: Can you complete all 30 seasonal realms?
70010000115960.name: Jigsaw Realms: Seasons

70010000117307.description:
Sakura Peak is a peaceful walking simulator set high in the Sakura-covered mountains of feudal Japan. Wander at your own pace through tranquil landscapes inspired by samurai-era villages, quiet shrines, and endless cherry blossom valleys.

Let the wind guide you along mountain paths as petals fall around you. Listen to the soft sounds of nature, distant temples, and wooden bridges creaking beneath your feet. Sakura Peak is designed to help you slow down, breathe, and simply exist in a beautiful world.

Features:
>Relaxing Walking Simulator – Explore freely with no enemies, timers, or fail states
>Sakura Mountain Landscapes – Cherry blossom forests, misty peaks
>Samurai-Era Atmosphere – Traditional architecture, shrines, and peaceful rural paths
>Calming Soundscape – Gentle ambient music and natural environmental sounds
>Meditative Experience – Designed for relaxation, reflection, and stress relief


Every path in Sakura Peak is crafted to reward curiosity and calm exploration. Follow winding trails, pause to watch petals drift through the air, or stand silently as the sun sets behind the mountains. The world responds not with challenge, but with serenity.
70010000117307.intro: Take the path. Breathe. Walk among the blossoms.
70010000117307.name: Sakura Peak

70010000102263.description:
Decide: is it a dying earth, or is it on the verge of rebirth? 

Do anything and everything. Caves of Qud is a deeply simulated, biologically diverse, richly cultured world.

DEEP PHYSICAL SIMULATION — Don’t like the wall blocking your way? Dig through it with a pickaxe, or eat through it with your corrosive gas mutation, or melt it to lava. Yes, every wall has a melting point.

FULLY SIMULATED CREATURES — Every monster and NPC is as fully simulated as the player. That means they have levels, skills, equipment, faction allegiances, and body parts. So if you have a mutation that lets you, say, psionically dominate a spider, you can traipse through the world as a spider, laying webs and eating things.

DYNAMIC FACTION SYSTEM — Pursue allegiances with over 70 factions: apes, crabs, trees, robots, and highly entropic beings, just to name a few.

RICHLY DETAILED SCIENCE FANTASY SETTING — Over fifteen years of worldbuilding have led to a rich, weird, labyrinthine, one-of-a-kind storyworld, layered on top of the simulation, all for you to explore. Live and drink, friend.

TACTICAL GAMEPLAY — Turn-based, sandbox exploration and combat offers as many solutions as you and your mutations, implants, artifacts, and skills are creative enough to invent.

RPG ELEMENTS — Quests, NPCs, villages, historic sites; some dynamic and some handwritten, interwoven to produce a transportative RPG experience.

ATMOSPHERIC ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK — Over two hours of otherworldly music to delve to.

Caves of Qud has one of the most expressive character creators of all time.

Play the role of a mutant indigenous to the salt-spangled dunes and jungles of Qud, or play a true kin descendant from one of the few remaining eco-domes — the toxic arboreta of Ekuemekiyye, the ice-sheathed arcology of Ibul, or the crustal mortars of Yawningmoon.

Build your character out of:

- Over 70 mutations — outfit yourself with wings, two heads, four arms, flaming hands, teleportation, the power to clone yourself…

- Dozens of cybernetic implants (and more to find as treasure) — night vision, translucent skin, carbide fists, spring-loaded ankle tendons…

 - 24 castes and kits from across the social order of Qud and beyond Moghra’yi, the Great Salt Desert

 - Too overwhelmed to build a character from scratch? Choose one of 9 preset characters and start your adventure right away. Then return to character creation when you are ready.

Play one of four modes:

CLASSIC — Like other traditional roguelikes, this mode has permadeath, meaning you lose your character when you die. Extremely challenging even for experts.

ROLEPLAY — Play it like an RPG. Save your progress at checkpoints located in settlements.

WANDER — Focus on exploration. Most creatures will not attack you, you don’t gain experience by killing, but you DO gain experience by discovering new locations and treating with legendary creatures.

DAILY — One chance with a fixed character and world seed. How long will you survive?
70010000102263.intro: A Hugo Award-winning science fantasy roguelike epic steeped in retrofuturism, deep simulation, and swathes of sentient plants. Chisel through layers of thousand-year-old civilizations.
70010000102263.name: Caves of Qud

70010000117418.description:
Escape Prison Obby: Getaway is a fast-paced parkour (obby) adventure where your goal is simple: break out of prison and reach the escape helicopter!

Features:
>Fun and challenging obby parkour gameplay
>Tricky jumps, moving obstacles, and traps
>Race to reach the helicopter and complete your getaway
>Perfect for casual and competitive players

Do you have what it takes to escape the prison and make a clean getaway?
70010000117418.intro: You’re locked up… but not for long.
70010000117418.name: Escape Prison Obby: Getaway

70010000118469.description:
The Island is an Escape Room where you have to make your way through intelligence and lateral thinking. You will solve a huge number of puzzles while discovering an interesting story and moving through the corners of an island full of challenges. Search for clues, find objects and secrets and keep a cool head, because only then you will be able to get out alive from The Island.

Features
- Dozens of puzzles that will challenge your mind
- Large island with different atmospheres
- A story that will keep you hooked
- From escape room lovers to escape room lovers
70010000118469.intro: You wake up on an unknown island, alone and without help. Will you be able to solve the mysteries it contains? Will you find out how you got there? Could you escape from The Island?
70010000118469.name: The Island - Escape Room

70010000116686.description: Access a selection of classic Virtual Boy games on your Nintendo Switch 2 or Nintendo Switch, including Galactic Pinball and Teleroboxer. Dedicated accessories required to play are available to buy from My Nintendo Store!
70010000116686.name: Virtual Boy – Nintendo Classics

70010000101810.description:
Lead a rag-tag group of kooky carriers in this delivery service RPG as they protect and trek packages through treacherous terrain, unruly monsters, and meet other sneaky delivery service teams ready to stake their claim as the best delivery service in the Orkotris Region!

Rain or shine—a new adventure awaits with every package! 

Key Features

In the Mood for Battle? – Running a tip-top delivery service means mailing out orders AND keeping your crew in check. Watch their moods—if they’re unhappy, they might ignore your commands, but their negligence could deliver positive surprises and even victories in battle!

Out for Delivery! – Head to the Bulletin Board and see what deliveries await! Inspect the parcel, pack it tightly (no gaps allowed!), and assemble your crew with the right gear (to bonk any pesky foes) and tools for a smooth drop-off. Each successful drop-off delivers sweet rewards your way, so handle with care!

Delivery in 3-5 Business Days (Unless you Run into a Boss) – Start your adventure with a roulette spin to determine your next move. Land on shop spaces for goodies, collect special packages for rewards, and maybe tackle some sneaky bosses along the way!

Kei Nanameda… Delivers! – Character designer, Kei Nanameda, presents a fresh delivery service world with lively dialogue, intense battles, and a quirky cast full of energy!
70010000101810.intro: First-class fun in this delivery service RPG with a board game twist!
70010000101810.name: Calamity Angels: Special Delivery

70010000106569.description:
Guide vampires through centuries of emotional baggage, decades of delusions and the odd bout of self-loathing with real cognitive behavioral therapy concepts and become a Vampire Therapist! Even vampires need a shoulder to cry on when a neck to bite just won’t do.

STORY
Vampire Therapist is a narrative adventure / therapy simulator in the vein (get it) of What We Do in the Shadows, Young Frankenstein, My Dinner with André, and Horrible Histories where you play as a reformed bloodsucker helping other vampires find inner peace.
This isn't your typical visual novel — featuring a fangtastic cast (such as Matthew Mercer, Sarah Grayson, and Cyrus Nemati), Vampire Therapist teaches real therapy concepts with a story that explores what it means to live, die, live again, and maybe even how to feel alive. Because even vampires deserve to love themselves.
Step into the boots of Sam, a reformed Wild West gunslinger turned vampire therapist. After centuries of bloodshed, Sam teams up with a 3000-year-old blood-sucking mentor in a moody German nightclub, to guide fellow vampires through the twists and turns of their immortal existence — offering them a chance at self-acceptance in a world that feels ever more alien.


FEATURES
1. Real Therapy Concepts: You’ll learn and apply real cognitive behavioral therapy concepts vetted by licensed therapists. By challenging client statements that contain “cognitive distortions”, you’ll help vampires see where their thoughts don’t match reality.
2. A Comedic Look Through History: Meet emotionally damaged vampires from ancient Greece, Renaissance Italy, Tudor England, and the Bronze Age.
3. An All-Star Voice Cast:  Featuring Matthew Mercer, Francesca Meaux, Sarah Grayson, Kylie Clark, and the game's creator, Cyrus Nemati.
4. Unique Setting: Vampire Therapist merges cozy self-introspection with a dark European goth vibe. In fact, the whole thing takes above a goth club in Germany filled with willing necks to bite.
5. Minigames: Learn mindfulness meditation, safely and consensually bite sexy necks

NOTE: The game deals with mature and challenging themes that are not for the faint of heart.
70010000106569.name: Vampire Therapist

70010000111989.description:
Welcome Proxima, we are Counter Horror, an organisation of scientists and occultists who have combined forces to take on the evil threatening our universe. You have been in stasis for some time, you have been awoken to aid in our fight. 
Your psyche level is stable for now, but it won’t be for long, the closer to the outer gods, the less stable humanity becomes, use your military training to end them. Failure is not an option Commander.
Your mission is simple, defend Earth and destroy the Outer Gods.

Play as one of many Proxima’s used to help defend humanity in this turn-based, roguelike, intergalactic deck builder!

- Roguelike: Play as a Proxima, awoken from stasis, with unique skills
- Turn-Based: Command a fleet of upgradable ships through combat
- Deckbuilder: Combine, collect and combo six factions of cards
- Upgrade: Collect artifacts, D.I.C.E and sanity shards to help along your way
- Embrace the occult using powerful ritual cards
- Bosses: Defend Earth and destroy the Outer Gods
- Awaken a Proxima with unique skills and downfalls to help you to take on the horrors
- Command a fleet of upgradable ships across the universe
- Make pivotal decisions when encountering obstacles between combat, which could help boost or decimate your run
- 6 different factions of cards can be combined, collected and combo-ed to defeat the horrors in your own way
- Control your fate using D.I.C.E to increase your chances of survival during random encounters
- Embrace the occult using ritual cards to powerfully destroy and beat the competition
- Earn credits to buy and upgrade your cards
- Unlock artifacts on your run to transform your ships powers
- Unlock multiple different Proxima’s, each with their own unique set of skills and downfalls
70010000111989.intro: Earth has fallen. Science and the Occult have united forces to brace for the arrival of the Eldritch. But will the efforts against this strange, alien race be enough?
70010000111989.name: Starless Abyss

70010000113523.description:
Cute Astro is a cosy, pixel-art puzzle where you play a rockstar mouse pushing tasty cheese cubes across musical score boards. Each board has score holes that must be filled with cheese to complete the riff and open the way forward. The challenge is all about careful planning, avoiding deadlocks, and pushing in the right order.
With 30 handcrafted levels, two themed stages, instant Undo and Restart, and a playful concert atmosphere, it’s perfect for casual players and logic-puzzle fans who enjoy relaxing, brain-teasing challenges.
Across 30 levels in two biomes, the crisp Purple Stage and the warm Orange Stage, the player enters a compact grid filled with obstacles, cheese cubes, and score holes. A level ends only when every hole is filled. There is no timer and every action can be reversed through Undo or Restart, keeping the focus on planning, iteration, and discovery.
Moment-to-moment the loop is simple and satisfying: observe, plan a route, move tile by tile, push cheese into place, adjust with Undo or Restart, fill every hole, and enjoy the musical sting that celebrates your victory.
70010000113523.intro: A Puzzle Show on the Star Stage
70010000113523.name: Cute Astro

70010000115816.description:
DISCOVER THE LEGEND OF WHAT'S UNDER THE ISLAND!
Uncover a sinking mystery and step into the role of Nia, a newcomer to Seashell Island - and join forces with local girl Avocado to investigate an ominous fate - the island's destined to sink beneath the ocean! Explore colorful regions, battle strange creatures, and uncover the ancient mysteries that could threaten your new home.

CLASSIC TOP-DOWN ADVENTURE
Journey across a lush island, brought to life with vibrant pixel art and timeless top-down exploration. Delve into hidden corners, uncover secrets, and face dangerous foes across diverse, interconnected biomes.

SIX DISTINCT REGIONS TO EXPLORE
From eerie sentient greenhouses, to frozen caverns, and chaotic sawmills, each biome holds its own dangers, upgrades, and treasures to uncover! Become the champion of the cook-off, reunite lost cats, and dodge the rage of the cereal pirates.

STRANGE ENEMIES & UNUSUAL TACTICS
Face off against vomiting eggplants, tunnelling wolves, and other bizarre creatures. Use artefacts, loot, and new abilities you discover to turn the tide of battle. Befriend animals and see if they can help you on your adventure - particularly if you give them treats!

A CAST OF MEMORABLE CHARACTERS
Meet the island’s quirky inhabitants, each with their own personality, story, and a role to play in your adventure. Forge friendships, lend a hand, and see how they can aid you in return.
70010000115816.intro: A 2D action-adventure steeped in ‘90s charm! Step into the shoes of Nia, and battle fierce monsters, solve clever puzzles, and explore a world alive with mystery.
70010000115816.name: UNDER THE ISLAND

70010000072098.description:
Lux has no time for bullies. To take down the Skate Bums who dominate Beluga City, she'll have to beat them at their own game, even though she's never touched a board before!

Jump into an epic journey from total newbie to legendary skater! Navigate through hostile turf in quick, intense sessions, taking down the Skate Bums one by one. But beware - they don't play fair! To rise to the top, you'll need to master your environment, outsmart your rivals, and shred through gnarly multi-layered levels with undeniable style.

Inspired by the skate culture of the 80s and 90s, Skate Bums blends fast, expressive 2D action with old-school flavour, all delivered in a vibrant illustrative art style. Are you ready to prove that anyone can skate their way to greatness?

FEATURES:
• Boss Battles on skateboards
• In-your-face 90s art style
• Simple directional trick system
• Quick session gameplay
• Multi-layered levels
• Over 100 unlockable items
• High-score and challenge progression
• 90s soundtrack
• A skateboarding story full of weird characters
70010000072098.name: Skate Bums

70010000081345.description:
A brand new PARANORMASIGHT tale begins in Ise-Shima, Japan - a region rich in mermaid legends.
Join a cast of fascinating characters investigating the mysteries of the Mermaids of Ise. Unravel their different perspectives on the case and guide the story to its thrilling conclusion.

Story:
The remote island of Kameshima sits nestled in Ise bay.
Yuza Minakuchi is a young pearl diver who lives on the island and spends his days underwater gathering, together with his best friend Azami Kumoi. After he has a bewildering supernatural experience encountering another version of himself on the ocean floor, a series of curses start to befall the island...
A girl of unknown origins, a treasure hunter from a foreign land and a mysterious housewife investigating a drowning. Paths cross and destinies collide as they come closer to the secret of the Mermaids of Ise, a legend that has been obscured by the fog of history for so long. 

Features:
- A brand-new story that starts with a new location, new supernatural legends and a new cast of characters.
- Faithful reproductions of real locations and vistas in collaboration with Mie prefecture. Investigate stunning 360 degree backgrounds for clues.
- Numerous new gameplay systems and mechanics, including a new Diving mini game.
- Multiple characters, each dealing with their own mysteries to unravel.
- Unearth the truth by your own hand! 

*Once you have downloaded the game, no further monetary transactions are required and the whole story can be enjoyed to the ending.
70010000081345.intro: Will you survive the curse together this summer?
70010000081345.name: PARANORMASIGHT: The Mermaid's Curse

70010000102885.description:
Blaze of Storm is a vertical-scrolling shmup featuring cyber-inspired pixel art, exhilarating fast-scrolling, and a variety of sub-weapons.

As a cyberdiver, you'll delve into cyberspace and battle a diverse range of enemies. Each of the five selectable sub-weapons has its own unique characteristics, making it fun to use them appropriately depending on the situation.

In addition, when a sub-weapon comes into contact with an enemy, it generates an explosion that deals continuous damage. Making good use of this explosion is key to victory.

More than 20 unique bosses appear one after another, providing a varied and condensed gameplay experience.
70010000102885.name: Blaze of Storm

70010000105809.description:
Let's play a game again. The game you already know. Still on the real streets. The rule is the same - score.    

New areas where the streetball can be played. Discover new locations your best game. Old areas and new areas - all is here to bring you the maximum joy. Sometimes it's not easy, but it's always fun! Jump, rotate, dunk, score. Repeat. Beat all the records in the game. Set your own level of supremacy!         

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Keep playing the streetball in your own way!
70010000105809.intro: The streets are calling us again! It's time to play!
70010000105809.name: Dunk Trickster 2

70010000107107.description:
Taking Satisfactory, Forager and the gratifying gameplay loop of clicker/idle games as references, Outpath would be just that. Exploit your environment, craft, build and automate your base in this 3D first-person platformer!

Gather. Craft. Build. Explore. Relax. No time limits, no pressure, play at your own pace and style.

Gather, collect and manage resources.
Craft useful items.
Base building, automate everything.
Buy islands to expand and exploit!
Fishing.
Level up skills and unlock new blueprints.
Parkour movements.
Play active or idle, you choose!
Music reacts to your actions.
Uncover the secrets of this stylized place.
70010000107107.intro: Gather. Craft. Build. Explore. Relax. No time limits, no pressure, play at your own pace and style.
70010000107107.name: Outpath

70010000109188.description:
With his family slain and village destroyed, Korvald is branded a heretic and seemingly condemned to death, but the truth of his torment is part of a bigger and more sinister agenda! Join forces with beautiful warrior nuns, alluring mythical figures and interdimensional creatures to prevent our world from being devoured. Can you contain your primal urges and fight to survive?

Book of Korvald is a side-scrolling 2D action-adventure where each chapter takes place across an entire country, spanning more than 30 areas of Scandinavia and beyond. Control Korvald as he makes key decisions, encounters dozens of memorable characters and wields a huge variety of weapons against his foes, from axes and swords to whips and maces! Use runes to unleash powerful elemental spells or summon creatures to assist you. Customize your skills to match your playstyle and face off against 30 unique bosses!

• Explore 30 stages as a condemned Norse scribe!
• Wield various weapon types in real-time combat.
• Unlock and upgrade skills across an expansive talent tree!
• Engage in mini-games, from fishing and farming to drinking contests and arena battles.
• Meet dozens of female companions and other unique NPCs!
70010000109188.intro: Guide a tormented Norse scribe and in his desperate alliance with a parasitic eldritch entity!
70010000109188.name: Book of Korvald

70010000110400.description:
Soulkin is a tactical, Roguelite game that blends strategic monster-collecting with turn-based combat. As the summoned heroine, Nadia, you’ll harness the power of Souls to bond with magical creatures and lead them against the encroaching corruption threatening Ankiril. 

This mystical world, anchored around a colossal tree, teems with magical creatures known as Soulkin, each infused with the power of elements. Will you rise to the challenge and become the savior of Ankiril? 

Engage in turn-based battles that require tactical positioning and clever use of your Soulkin’ abilities. Adapt your tactics to overcome formidable foes and environmental challenges on a hexagonal grid. 

Select from multiple Soulkin squads and Nadia variants, each boasting distinct elemental strengths and playstyles. As you complete objectives, you’ll unlock new squads, additional power-ups, and stronger abilities. Strategically choose and enhance your squad to confront Ankiril’s ever-growing threats.

Navigate through challenging encounters and unlock new events, bonuses, and increased stats. Your journey will be difficult, but the rewards are plentiful for those who persevere. 

Each chapter offers a fresh and unique gameplay experience with dynamic maps, battles, and events. This ensures varied and exciting playthroughs every time, keeping the gameplay engaging and unpredictable.
70010000110400.intro: Immerse yourself in Soulkin, a tactical, monster-collecting Roguelite. Play as Nadia, a heroine summoned to save the world of Ankiril.
70010000110400.name: Soulkin

70010000112521.description:
Ready for a brand new Lost in Space adventure? Explore treacherous environments, solve puzzles and mysteries as you investigate the disappearance of the other members of the Jupiter 2!

After being trapped in a cave on a late-night rock hunting excursion, Will returns to the spaceship only to find that it's been raided during the night! Team up with the mercurial Dr. Smith and the always-faithful Robot, to unravel the mystery behind the disappearance of Will's parents, his sisters as well as Major Don West.

Lost in Space – the First Adventure will return you to the imaginative world of the beloved 60's television series. The game is designed to be the spiritual "fourth season" that fans have always craved. Recreated with loving detail to perfectly capture the personalities of all the members of the Jupiter 2. 

KEY FEATURES: 
-The game lovingly recreates the wonderous world of the beloved 60's television series in this “fourth season” spiritual successor.
-Match wits with some of the original series' most nefarious villains including Saticons, Invaders from the Fifth Dimension, the Giant Cyclops and more!
-The game uses dialogue taken directly from the show as well as the original music including the iconic theme songs!
-Work your way through lots of challenging puzzles along with a multi-tiered help system to assure that you'll never get stuck.
70010000112521.intro: Point & click adventure game based on the TV show: Lost in Space - play as Will Robinson and team up with Dr. Smith and Robot!
70010000112521.name: Lost In Space - The First Adventure

70010000114448.description:
Temari Trials: Dojo’s Test is a logic-focused puzzle game with charming pixel art where you guide a clever fox pushing temaris toward locked chests. Every hit removes a lock, and when a chest is fully unlocked, the level is cleared. Temaris can also push each other, allowing creative setups and surprising solutions for players who enjoy Japanese aesthetics and clever problem-solving.

The game features 30 handcrafted single-player stages with challenges that evolve based on how many hits each chest requires and how temaris can be positioned to reach them. You control a fox exploring levels filled with temaris and chests that range from 1 to 3 locks. Your goal is to plan the order and direction of every push while considering obstacles and placement.

You begin each stage by observing your options. Then you act, watch the result and use undo or restart if needed. When all locks are broken by hitting the chests with the correct temaris, the fox clears the mission and advances to the next challenge.
70010000114448.name: Temari Trials: Dojo's Test

70010000117083.description:
Find the one odd detail hidden in each photo!
This is a spot-the-difference game where every image contains exactly one “something’s off” moment.

Simple, satisfying, and surprisingly addictive—the instant you find it, you’ll feel that perfect click of relief.

Controls are easy:
take a close look at the photo and simply select the spot that seems suspicious.
The rules are intuitive, so even if you’re not a seasoned gamer, you can jump right in.

Play solo and focus… or gather with family and friends and point at the screen together:
“Is it here?” “No—maybe over there!”
It’s a party game everyone can enjoy, no matter the age.

Ready to put your observation skills to the test?
70010000117083.intro:
Can you spot something “off”?
A spot-the-oddity game where you hunt for strange details in images!
70010000117083.name: Snapshot Oddities ! Find What’s Wrong

70010000117633.description:
This is a brain-training game where the text color and the word’s meaning don’t match—choose the correct answer!

The rules are simple:
Focus on the color of the word at the top of the screen, and choose from the options below based on the word’s meaning.

It looks easy, yet it tricks you every time…
Enjoy the oddly challenging fun of the Stroop effect in a casual, pick-up-and-play format!

With 4-choice, 6-choice, and 8-choice modes, the difficulty increases step by step—great for beginners and for those who want a real mental workout.

Designed for quick sessions, it’s perfect for short breaks in your day!
70010000117633.intro:
Simple brain training: spot the mismatch between color and words.
Top shows the color, bottom shows the word.
70010000117633.name: Color Mismatch Brain Quiz

70010000117852.description:
This coloring book is a guarantee of good mood.
In it you can find all kinds of pictures for every taste.
Coloring by numbers with Colorizing is a calming and easy activity for people of all ages. 
This drawing game is suitable for children and adults, everyone can enjoy pixel coloring.
You will definitely love coloring with this beautiful coloring book!
70010000117852.intro: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation
70010000117852.name: Colorizing: Sunshine

70010000075213.description:
Buskers, party animals, troublemakers. They’ve been given many names, but they call themselves Baladins! These legendary heroes wander from town-to-town to fulfill their sacred quest: entertaining the masses!

It’s a difficult task, but one the Baladins take in stride. From helping those in need to throwing parties, they bring surprises with them wherever their travels take them. All that matters to them is bringing joy to the people who inhabit the bright and lively world of Gatherac.

Embark on your quest as one of the Baladins: the imaginative Cook, the crafty Luxomancer, the strapping Dancer, the expressive Pyro, or the ever-charismatic Bard. United by their passion for happiness, each Baladin brings their own unique skills to the table and can hone their talents further throughout the adventure by making choices and collecting items. 

Inspired by tabletop roleplaying campaigns, Baladins is a choose-your-own-story game for players of all ages and experience levels. Roll the dice and see where your adventures take you. Your decisions are not inherently good or bad – just creative approaches that can lead to interesting outcomes!

And if you’d rather not play alone, Baladins supports up to four players–either locally or online! You can spread your journey over bite-sized sessions so you can explore Gatherac and its many secrets at your own pace. The story of any given session can change wildly depending on the choices you make each turn, so each playthrough brings its own new surprises!

Features

- Choose your own adventure! Bring joy to the people of Gatherac with 1-4 players and let your collective choices shape the fate of this unusual world.
- Be a hero! Play as one of five unique classes, each with its own strengths and weaknesses, and watch your character grow as the story unfolds!
- Play at your own pace! The story of the Baladins can be played in short sessions over the course of the whole campaign.
- Encounter a dragon! It wouldn’t be a fantasy roleplaying game without one!
70010000075213.intro: Go on a whimsical journey through a fantasy world in this roleplaying adventure
70010000075213.name: Baladins

70010000093576.description:
Run, jump, and reverse the flow of gravity itself to escape the mind of a selfish god in this challenging precision platformer. Play as Maya, a child stolen from her family on the whim of a lonely, forsaken deity, and make your way through over 100 screens filled with spikes, lasers, switches, and traps as you unravel the horrifying secret of your new prison.

- Gorgeous hand-drawn pixel art graphics bring the god’s realm to life alongside meticulously handcrafted animations boasting many thousands of frames
- A lush, atmospheric score, equal parts unsettling and beautiful
- Responsive, snappy controls provide challenges with a sense of mastery and acrobatic accomplishment
- A psychological horror narrative contorts and unfolds to reveal choices beyond comprehension

Will you find your way home, or wander these halls carved of memory forever?
70010000093576.intro: Wander a castle built of bitter memories in LOVE ETERNAL, a psychological horror platformer with devious trials and an unsettling, experimental narrative.
70010000093576.name: LOVE ETERNAL

70010000096208.description:
ENTER THE DUNGEON
The city of Wizarest has been cut off from communication with the outside world. Those who have awakened have forgotten who they are, who their neighbors are, and live without any memories of their past. The only things they know are the dangers of the dungeons surrounding the city, the monsters that inhabit them, and the magic needed to counter them. The citizens have been trying to navigate the dungeons for years, but to no avail. Even after 100 years, no exit has been found. Now, a new wizard is heading into the dungeons to defy the monsters…

THE BATTLE SYSTEM
Welcome to WiZmans World Re;Try! This is a thrilling RPG adventure with a fantastic story that changes based on your choices, and a deep yet simple battle system. Make full use of the timeline above the screen to develop your strategy: read the enemy's HP, the attack order, everyone's status, and aim for the most effective way to win. Water is stronger than Fire, Fire is stronger than Wind, Wind is stronger than Earth, and Earth is stronger than Water. Keep this in mind and use the best attacks to counter the enemy. Don't forget to chain attacks to defeat enemies quickly!

MEET THE HOMUNCULI
At first glance, the homunculi of WiZmans World Re;Try look like fairies. They have the power to ease the souls of defeated monsters and can fuse with them through Anima Fusion. Thanks to Anima Fusion, they can inherit the stats, status effects, skills, and appearance of defeated monsters. Adopt stronger monster abilities, inherit skills, and create your own powerful guardian. With the homunculi at your side, you're never truly alone!

A CLASSIC FROM 2009
Jaleco, known for releasing games until 2000, launched this RPG classic on portable consoles in 2009. The game features well-drawn pixel graphics and a simple yet challenging difficulty level, earning high praise from RPG fans. In this remaster, the graphics have been enhanced, the BGM rearranged, new tracks added (all remade by soLi), and the UI and playability optimized. This is the ultimate version of WiZmans World, with all the charm of the original.
70010000096208.intro: Harness your magic powers, absorb enemies, and evolve your three homunculi to triumph. It's a truly spellbinding adventure!
70010000096208.name: WiZmans World Re;Try

70010000100404.description:
Step into the myth-shrouded lands where the hunter Ro begins her journey to bring her son back from the dead. Immerse yourself in the depths of the Spirit World, fractured into 4 realms and scarred with 13 distinct regions. Confront over 30 enemy types and harness the potential of more than 160 cards, forging unique archetypes and a multitude of powerful combinations. A dark journey awaits you, spanning 25+ hours of gameplay, with numerous enthralling side quests and grim boss battles.

Master Your Deck-Building Skills
Craft over 160 cards and fashion synergistic decks that focus on poison, strength, sacrifice, retaliation, backstabbing, blocking, movement, and more. Discover shamanic totems with unique effects to enhance your deck. Each new element allows you to tailor your tactical style as you prepare for your next deadly encounter.

Engage in Grid-Based Combat
Face a host of restless spirits - Skulldogs, Crackle Bursts, Woeful Seashrooms and more - in grid-based battles where each move is crucial. Test your wit by fighting unique enemy types, powerful bosses, and mini-bosses, all while taking into account environmental hazards and boons. Grow stronger, adapt your deck, and choose your battles as you explore a vast world filled with dangerous challenges.

Journey to the spirit realm
In forgotten lands shrouded by myth, Ro - a hunter from a small tribe - is overcome by grief following the death of her beloved son. Guided by voices from another world, she transcends into the realm of spirits, in hopes of bringing him back. Meet strange spirits and help them with quests and challenges that affect your deck – although not all of them may have your best interests at heart. Discover a mysterious world of forgotten lore, where darkness whispers secrets and invites you to unearth buried memories.
70010000100404.name: Death Howl

70010000100420.description: Start a scary adventure and be the first to solve all the mysteries of this horror game! You'll have to immerse yourself in a thrilling and exciting adventure together with the main characters! Children have been missing for a long time in Lakewitch, and you are destined to solve this creepy mystery. Who is the kidnapper, and why is he doing it? Where are the children disappearing to, and how to save them? You can solve all the puzzles and find out the answers...if you don't get scared! In this part of our horror, you will meet Samantha and try to get out of prison with her. You will get to know new secrets of the terrible kidnapper, which will lead you to new frightening discoveries. On the way to your goal, puzzles, icey moments of fear, unexpected twists and turns, and lots of fun await you! The story will develop rapidly and very unpredictably. This horror game is an exciting, fun, and scary adventure to America of the '90s!
70010000100420.intro: Dive into the mysterious story of Lakewich. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth behind the missing children before the kidnapper finds you.
70010000100420.name: Horror Tale 2: Remaster

70010000110648.description:
Welcome to a world where desire, destiny, and strategy collide.

In Arcana, the legendary Tarot cards are no longer symbols.
They are seductive, powerful women, each one representing a different Arcana with her own personality, intentions, and hidden motives.

Talk to them.
Go on dates to unlock new abilities.
Gain their trust… or provoke their ambition.

But connection is only the beginning.

When conflict begins, conversations give way to strategic, roguelite-inspired card battles, where each run challenges you to adapt, plan, and evolve your approach.

Build your deck using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and face enemy armies in encounters where every card matters.

Your choices shape more than relationships.
They define how your Arcana fight, how they evolve, and which powers they are willing to unleash for you.

This is not a traditional visual novel.
This is a fusion of narrative intimacy and tactical card combat.


Features:

● ARCANA AS CHARACTERS: 
The Tarot comes to life as powerful, seductive women, each with unique abilities, personalities, and motivations.

● NARRATIVE PROGRESSION & DATES:
Talk to the Arcana, go on dates, and unlock new skills that directly affect combat.

● STRATEGIC ROGUELITE CARD COMBAT:
Every run is different. Adapt your deck, manage risk, and refine your strategy as challenges escalate.

● DECK BUILDING & SYNERGY:
Create powerful combinations using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and shape your own playstyle.

● ARMY BASED ENCOUNTERS:
Face increasingly dangerous enemy forces in tactical card battles where positioning and timing matter.

● CHOICE DRIVEN EVOLUTION:
Your decisions influence how the Arcana grow, fight, and what powers they are willing to reveal.


Some Arcana seek control.
Others crave devotion.
All of them have a price.

Will you master the cards…
or let them master you?
70010000110648.intro:
Seductive Arcana.
Strategic cards.
Power is won by choice.
70010000110648.name: The Arcana: Dark Tarot & Queens of Madness

70010000110659.description:
Welcome to a world where power, destiny, and strategy collide.

In "The Arcana: Dark Tarot & Kings of Madness", the legendary Tarot cards are no longer symbols.
They are dangerous, charismatic men, each embodying a different Arcana, driven by ambition, dominance, and hidden intent.

Talk to them.
Go on dates to unlock new abilities.
Earn their loyalty… or challenge their authority.

But connection is only the beginning.

When conflict begins, conversations give way to strategic, roguelite-inspired card battles, where every run challenges you to adapt, plan, and assert control.

Build your deck using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and face enemy armies in encounters where every card shapes the outcome.

Your choices shape more than relationships.
They define how your Arcana fight, how they evolve, and which powers they are willing to place in your hands.

This is not a traditional visual novel.
This is a fusion of narrative tension and tactical card combat.

Some Arcana seek domination.
Others demand loyalty.
All of them have a price.


Features:

● ARCANA AS CHARACTERS:
The Tarot comes to life as powerful male Arcana, each with distinct abilities, personalities, and ambitions.

● NARRATIVE PROGRESSION & DATES:
Talk to the Arcana, go on dates, and unlock new skills that directly affect combat.

● STRATEGIC ROGUELITE CARD COMBAT:
Every run is different. Adapt your deck, manage risk, and refine your strategy as challenges escalate.

● DECK BUILDING & SYNERGY:
Create powerful combinations using the Arcana you’ve bonded with and define your own playstyle.

● ARMY BASED ENCOUNTERS:
Face increasingly dangerous enemy forces in tactical card battles where positioning and timing matter.

● CHOICE DRIVEN EVOLUTION:
Your decisions influence how the Arcana grow, fight, and which powers they are willing to place at your disposal.


Will you command the cards…
or lose yourself to their madness?
70010000110659.intro:
Dark Arcana.
Strategic cards.
Power bends to your will.
70010000110659.name: The Arcana: Dark Tarot & Kings of Madness

70010000112962.description:
In a place in Albuquerque, New Mexico, USA, a strange accident occurred on October 27, 1986. Everything was recorded on a VHS tape. 

Enter the eerie world of Backrooms Level X, a first-person horror game that immerses you in an endless labyrinth of desolate and surreal spaces. After a freak accident, you find yourself trapped in the Backrooms, a place where logic and reality vanish.  Explore endless corridors of yellow carpet, empty rooms and areas of flickering light as you try to find a way out. But beware: you are not alone. Mysterious entities lurk in the shadows, and every sound may be the last you hear. 

Features: 

Immersive Exploration: Navigate an immersive environment made with unique level design. Discover hidden secrets and an immersive narrative that will draw you into the story. 

Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in an oppressive atmosphere with immersive sound effects and haunting graphics that will keep you on the edge of your seat. 

Challenges and Puzzles: Solve riddles and face challenges that will test your wits as you try to escape from the Backrooms. 

Varied Environments: Backrooms Level X consists of more than 15 levels to explore. Discover the intricacies of the story and enemies, keeping each game a fresh and exciting experience. 

Defiant Bosses: Get out unscathed from huge final enemies. Throughout the exploration, we will encounter gigantic bosses that we will have to defeat with our wits. 

Do you have what it takes to survive in the Backrooms? The only way out is to face your fears and discover the truth behind this terrifying place. Download Backrooms Level X and begin your journey into the unknown!
70010000112962.intro: Enter the disturbing world of Backrooms Level X, a first-person narrative survival horror game that immerses you in an endless labyrinth of desolate and liminal spaces.
70010000112962.name: Backrooms Level X

70010000113537.description:
Get ready to flap your wings and fire up your brain, because the hummingbird is about to turn the garden into a festival of logic. Hummingbird Garden is a charming pixel-art puzzle where you push little pollen nuggets through tight pathways until each flower blooms in a colourful display. It is the perfect mix of calm thinking, strategy, and a touch of natural magic.

You study the garden, choose the best route, avoid getting stuck, and decide the right order to deliver each pollen nugget. There is no rush. Every move can be undone with Undo or tried again with Restart, letting you experiment freely until you find the most elegant solution. It is a game made for thinking peacefully and enjoying every small discovery.

With 30 handcrafted levels divided into two biomes, the gardens offer varied terrain, natural obstacles, and many satisfying moments when flowers light up to celebrate your success. Each level feels like a small pollination mission, and completing one gives that delightful sense of making the world a little more beautiful.
70010000113537.intro: A Garden Full of Blooming Puzzles
70010000113537.name: Hummingbird Garden

70010000113651.description:
The gates creak open, and you step into a wasteland of rust, smoke, and forgotten machines. Engines whisper stories of their past lives, and piles of metal wait for a second chance. It’s your job to bring the junkyard back to life—or let it swallow you whole.

Take the wheel of your truck and carve a path through twisted wrecks and shattered dreams. Scavenge for scrap, uncover hidden treasures buried beneath the rust, and decide what’s worth saving. Every haul means cash, every upgrade takes you closer to control.

Piece by piece, rebuild the broken. Organize the chaos. Watch as your junkyard transforms from a graveyard of steel into a thriving empire of rebirth. But keep your eyes open—this place has a strange memory, and not everything that’s buried wants to stay that way.

Rust, grease, and questionable business decisions—congratulations, you’re officially an entrepreneur.
70010000113651.intro: The only place where hoarding actually pays off.
70010000113651.name: Junkyard Builder Simulator

70010000114188.description:
This game introduces a four-zone rhythm system that divides the screen into distinct areas.
Notes travel from the edges toward the center—time your inputs perfectly to stay on beat.
Play with controller inputs or touchscreen controls and enjoy the game your way.
The mechanics are simple, using only single notes and simultaneous inputs, but achieving perfect accuracy takes skill.

Set in a digital world, the story follows strange events unfolding within a social rhythm game.
Avatars are stolen, mysterious entities appear, and unsettling messages begin to surface.
The story progresses through chat screens, with conversations gradually revealing what is really happening.
Beyond the chat, the story continues—quietly, but inevitably.

Climb the online leaderboards and aim for the ultimate score of 1,000,000 points.
An accessible yet demanding rhythm game designed for players who value precision.
70010000114188.intro:
Four-Zone Rhythm Game!
Feel the beat with simple controls!
70010000114188.name: Bug!Ban!Break!

70010000114266.description:
[Overview]
Shizuku and Akane… two pilots bound by rivalry and friendship battle to save their world from malevolent cosmic forces!

Multi-directional boomerang-style melee attacks, flamethrowers, burst lasers… a huge range of weapons is at your disposal to mix and match as you customise your ship and battle waves of enemies and bosses across a variety of game modes, including Local Co-Op Duo Play Mode and Boost Mode. Tweak the rules, team up for co-op play, or take on high-score challenges!

[Gameplay]
Pilot the super-advanced Revolgear space fighters Pheasant or Dove, and use precise movement, smart weapon choices and combat skills to earn extra lives and maximise your score!

Use the Bit Shoot attack for boomerang-style melee strikes, the burst system for a powerful energy beam, plus heaps of other weapons and loadouts you’ll unlock as you play!

[Features]
- Seven stages with four difficulty options.
- Two main game modes with six possible endings.
- Over 2,000 equipment combinations. Builds can be customised to suit each player’s preferences.
- Mission Mode with 30 different challenges to test your skills with various weapons and techniques.
- An unlock shop where you can obtain custom weapons and gear using in-game currency.
- Diverse stage designs: from menacing mechs to mystical dragons—anything goes!
- Two main characters with voice acting. Enjoy dialogues that change depending on the situation.
- Local co-op! In certain modes, an algorithmic AI partner can also join the fight.
- Includes the bizarre mystery bonus game “God of Cats”!
- In-game achievements.
70010000114266.intro: Fast-paced shmup action, heaps of loadout combos, and local co-op!
70010000114266.name: Revolgear Zero

70010000114299.description:
Seafrog is an action-platformer mashed with the movement of lite-skateboarding. Grind, kick-flip and find the flow with a rocket-powered wrench that moves smoother than a buttered beluga!

A SEA-SLICK PLATFORMER
String together combos by using a simple auto-trick system, landing grinds on enemies and rusty pipes to fuel up your rocket-wrench! Use the fuel to boost through enemies, fly straight up walls, and stick to ceilings in order to complete over 100 handcrafted challenges!

EXPLORE RUN DOWN SHIPS
Each chapter in Seafrog is based on a ships theme. Battle vengeful Viking ghosts aboard the Sea Dragon. Dig in for an unsavory meal aboard the Chunky Chacken, where you’ll discover a man-eating chicken outbreak. Finally, get ready for some monkey business at The Sweater Factory, an abandoned workshop run by an unexpected crew of apes causing all the ruckus. Each chapter holds a Master Gear, guarded by an ultimate boss.

MASTER GEAR, HO!
Battle the legendary Skraken, Metal Beak the Momma Chacken, and... Gerald. Face these colorful 'n crusty foes to retrieve the Master Gears and repair your cannon. Blast yourself to a stranded seaplane to escape the seahole, a mysterious sinking hole in the ocean… before ye end up in Davy Jones' Locker!
70010000114299.intro: Hop aboard Seafrog’s rocket-powered wrench and slide, grind, and trick your way through a one-of-a-kind 2.5D action-puzzle-platformer!
70010000114299.name: Seafrog

70010000114700.description:
All aboard! Get ready for a colorful, brain-teasing puzzle experience where your goal is simple but oh-so-addictive: arrange all passengers to fit perfectly on their matching buses. Sounds easy? Think again!

In this fun and relaxing puzzle game, you’ll face increasingly tricky challenges as you sort passengers by color and seat them correctly before the buses depart. Each level brings new patterns, tighter spaces, and more passengers to organize — testing your logic, speed, and strategic thinking.

Game Features:

Unique Puzzle Mechanics: Drag and arrange passengers so they fit into their designated bus seats. Every move counts!

Dozens of Fun Levels: Start simple and progress to more complex puzzles with multiple buses and limited space.

Colorful and Relaxing Visuals: A bright, cheerful design to keep your mind sharp and your mood lifted.

Earn Coins and Unlock Challenges: Complete levels perfectly to earn rewards and unlock new puzzles.

Brain-Training Gameplay: Sharpen your problem-solving skills while having endless fun.

Quick, Pick-up-and-Play Sessions: Perfect for short breaks or long puzzle-solving marathons.

Can you keep up with the rush and seat every passenger before the buses leave? Test your organizational skills, plan your moves carefully, and become the ultimate bus puzzle master!

Hop in, line up your passengers, and let the puzzle journey begin!
70010000114700.intro: Arrange passengers perfectly and master the ultimate bus puzzle challenge!
70010000114700.name: Bus Stop Shuffle

70010000115253.description:
Cargo Runner: Mars puts you in charge of high-risk supply deliveries on the Red Planet.

Remote colonies depend on regular cargo shipments, but the routes are hostile. Alien ambushes, unstable delivery zones, and strict operational requirements turn every job into a test of speed, control, and decision-making.

Combat is direct. Step out of your vehicle, deal with the threat, collect what’s left, and move on.
Money earned unlocks new weapons, vehicles, and upgrades for future runs.

Progress is persistent. Upgrades and base improvements provide long-term advantages, rewarding repeated missions and exploration.

You deliver. Mars decides if you survive.
70010000115253.intro: You deliver cargo - Mars decides if you survive
70010000115253.name: Cargo Runner - Mars

70010000115894.description:
Who says cats can’t be little troublemakers? In Bad Cat Angry Granny, you’re not just any pet—you’re the ultimate feline prankster with a mission: turn Granny’s peaceful home into your personal playground of chaos.

Scratch the furniture, knock over priceless vases, sneak snacks from the kitchen, and turn every cozy corner into a disaster zone. Each room is packed with toys, secrets, and breakable goodies just begging for your claws. But watch out—Granny’s on the lookout, and she’s not exactly patient with furry troublemakers.

Choose your cat’s look, from cute and cuddly to wild and wacky, then pounce your way through hilarious challenges and clever pranks. Outsmart Granny, push her buttons, and rack up points for every bit of mischief you pull off.

From the attic to the basement, every space is your stage for chaos. So sharpen those claws, flick your tail, and remember—life’s too short to be a “good kitty.”
70010000115894.name: Bad Cat Angry Granny

70010000116446.description:
Step into a warm, flour-dusted world where pan dulce takes center stage. Merge adorable conchas, cuernitos, and more to discover delicious new treats in this whimsical puzzle game. With a dash of strategy and a sprinkle of tradition, PancitoMerge blends the joy of classic falling block games with the vibrant spirit of a neighborhood panadería. 

Great for cozy breaks or chasing a high-score, no baking skills required!

The goal is simple: merge matching breads to create higher-level ones, aiming for the highest score possible while unlocking every type of bread in a single run. But be careful, the game ends if the breads stack up to the top of the bag!

A Tasty Twist: Every 5 drops, a customer arrives with a specific bread request. Fulfill their order by clicking/tapping on the requested bread in the bag.

PancitoMerge is a love letter to Mexican culture and the joy of pan dulce. From colorful conchas to buttery cuernitos, each bread is inspired by real treats found in local bakeries, celebrating the warmth, tradition, and creativity of Mexican baking.
70010000116446.intro: Drop, stack, and merge colorful pan dulce into bigger, tastier treats in this cozy game! Enjoy our charming visuals and simple gameplay!
70010000116446.name: PancitoMerge

70010000117667.description:
Originally released by Crystal Soft in 1990, this classic RPG follows the series' tradition of seamless storytelling. Just as "II" picked up right after the conclusion of the first game, this title begins the moment "II" ends. The story starts with a veteran warrior, who has survived countless adventures in the Dream World (Mugen-kai), finally returning to the nostalgic sights of their home world.

The game features a top-down perspective with symbol encounters (on-screen enemies). Players will form a party of up to four members to explore the world. While the protagonist is human, the potential allies are incredibly diverse—ranging from familiar races like Elves and Dwarves to formidable beings like Dragons and Giants. In a unique mechanical twist, equipment is tied to Race rather than Class, making your party composition a vital strategic choice. Upon reaching Level 13, you can select specific abilities to undergo a Class Change, with certain paths unlocking even further advanced classes at higher levels.

Combat utilizes an intuitive Auto-Battle system. Victory depends on the clever use of physical attacks and various magic spells. Defense is particularly effective against physical strikes, and mastering its use is the key to surviving tough encounters.

As a series highly regarded as a foundation of the Japanese RPG (JRPG) genre, it offers a grand narrative that is best experienced in its entirety. We invite you to take this opportunity to play through the series and witness the origins of the JRPG.
 

 *The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
 *Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000117667.intro: The epic conclusion to the Mugen no Shinzou series. After escaping the Dream World, the warrior’s long-awaited homecoming is cut short by a new, unforeseen trial!
70010000117667.name: EGGCONSOLE MUGEN NO SHINZOU III PC-8801mkIISR

70050000068971.description:
In this DLC, you get three special monsters that grant a large amount of experience points and three special monsters that drop a lot of money. They have been added to the list of enemies that can be re-fought in the in-game monster dictionary. You can battle them as many times as you like. Beat them and claim the rewards. A great way to grind!

* The first monster of each type can be fought from the monster dictionary immediately after starting the game.
* The remaining monsters will be unlocked as the scenario progresses.
70050000068971.name: Bonus Monster Pack

70070000033007.description: A classic memory game with a fun twist! Try your hand at it and keep your eyes peeled! How good is your memory? Test yourself in our game!
70070000033007.name: Spy Guy Memory Funny Bundle

70010000108721.description:
Stillborn Slayer is a dark fantasy action roguelike built around fast, punishing combat and replayable procedural runs.

Battle through a grim, hostile world filled with monstrous enemies, relying on skill, timing, and adaptability to survive. Death is expected — and progression comes from understanding the systems and improving with each attempt.

Procedural elements ensure that no two runs play exactly the same, making replayability a core part of the experience.


Features
* Action roguelike gameplay with fast-paced combat
* Hack-and-slash mechanics focused on skill and timing
* Various weapons and equipment you can upgrade
* Dark fantasy and horror-inspired setting
70010000108721.intro: Masterful roguelike combat in a dark fantasy settings
70010000108721.name: Stillborn Slayer

70010000118110.description:
The hit 2011 puzzle platform game is back and better than ever!

"A wicked smart, 16-bit puzzler." 

"A fun, jumpy puzzler."

"This platform-puzzle combo game is loads of fun." 

"If you're itching for a neat little platformer then look no further!"

Dr. Cavor is trapped inside the moon! Held captive by the mysterious Selenites, Dr. Cavor endeavors to escape to the surface and from there to Earth! But first he must match wits with the dwellers of the lunar underworld, whose catacombs are complex and deadly! Dr. Cavor has but two tools at his disposal: his unique genius and his prize invention, the anti-gravity spray 'Cavorite'.

He must match wits with the Selenites. He must avoid perils. He must battle monsters. And above all, he must escape the moon!
70010000118110.name: Cavorite

70010000118720.description:
Highway Roads Racer brings the heat of arcade racing to your console. This isn't just about speed; it's about mastering the physics of curved highways while weaving through dense traffic.

Push your skills to the limit, earn cash for risky manoeuvres, and build a garage of 15 high-performance cars—from agile sports cars to heavy muscle.

4 High-Octane Modes
-One Way: Tear through traffic at max speed.
-Two Ways: Double the risk. Dodge oncoming cars for massive multipliers.
-Time Attack: Race the clock. Hitting checkpoints is the only way to survive.
-Speed Bomb: Pure adrenaline. A bomb is rigged to your chassis—drop below the speed limit, and you explode!

3 Racing Conditions
-Sunny: Perfect visibility for setting new records.
-Rainy: Slick asphalt that challenges your traction.
-Night: Rely on your headlights and reflexes in the dark.

Experience the Rush
-Dynamic Curved Roads: Feel the G-force as you navigate realistic highway bends, unlike standard straight-line racers.
-Tight Gamepad Controls: Optimised analog steering gives you the precision needed to thread the needle between cars at high speeds.
-Progression Loop: Use your hard-earned race cash to upgrade your fleet and unlock the fastest machines on the road.

Start your engine. The highway awaits.
70010000118720.intro: Master the Curves. Own the Road.
70010000118720.name: Highway Roads Racer

70010000116174.description:
Set sail for mystery and beauty in Jigsaw Realms: Lost Isles, a relaxing jigsaw experience set across enchanting, long-forgotten islands. Explore tropical shores, hidden ruins, misty cliffs, and magical island realms!

The game features 30 handcrafted levels, each depicting a unique island scene filled with atmosphere and wonder. Play using touch controls or controllers! With the built-in saving system, you can stop whenever you want and continue later without losing progress.

Designed for both short sessions and extended play, Jigsaw Realms: Lost Isles is perfect for relaxing on the go or unwinding at home.

Features:
> 30 handcrafted jigsaw levels set across mysterious islands
> Fantasy and stylized island artwork, from tropical beaches to ancient ruins
> Touch controls and controller support, switch anytime
> Save and resume freely whenever you want
> A calm, cozy experience for all ages
70010000116174.intro: Can you uncover and complete all 30 lost isles?
70010000116174.name: Jigsaw Realms: Lost Isles

70010000117310.description:
Welcome to Frost Vale, a frozen Nordic valley buried in snow, ice, and ancient mystery.

Explore a vast, icy landscape inspired by Nordic wilderness — towering mountains, frozen forests, and silent ruins hidden beneath the frost. Wander through the valley as you search for hidden locations.

There are no rushing timers — only the cold wind, the echo of your footsteps, and the thrill of discovery. 

 Features:

>Beautiful frozen Nordic valley environment

>Calm exploration-based gameplay

>Search for hidden secrets

>Atmospheric snow, ice, and winter scenery

>Immersive and relaxing experience
70010000117310.intro: Step into the cold. Explore the unknown.
70010000117310.name: Frost Vale

70010000113506.description:
Grab your towels because the chilliest capybara in gaming is ready for a soak! In Capy Spa, you help Pipa, a relaxation-loving capybara, push herb buckets into hot springs to prepare the perfect bath.

With 30 carefully crafted levels, two charming biomes (Savanna River and Forest Onsen), and a soothing soundtrack that blends with the rising steam, every stage invites calm and thoughtful moves.

No enemies, no timer, no rush. The focus is on smart movement, experimenting, undoing, and trying again until you find the perfect sequence. Sometimes, pools start already filled, and you’ll need to reorganise everything with patience and logic.

It feels like solving a puzzle while watching steam dance and leaves drift by. Each completed level brings that quiet satisfaction of seeing Pipa’s spa finally ready to relax.

Capy Spa is the kind of puzzle that makes you smile in peace, turning simple bucket-pushing into a zen and delightful experience.
70010000113506.intro: Capy Spa: The Most Relaxing Bath in the Savanna
70010000113506.name: Capy Spa

70010000066614.description:
Hunt the Night is a retro-style action-RPG that blends fast, skillful combat with dark fantasy lore. Play as Vesper, a member of the Stalkers, and traverse the ruined world of Medhram on a mission to save humanity from a deadly cycle of annihilation. Endure nightmarish overworlds, slash through horrific dungeons, face brutal bosses, and wield an arsenal of powers in a relentless struggle against the Night itself.

In the 9th Age, humanity is trapped in a vicious cycle on the verge of extinction. The day is ruled by humans, while the Night brings annihilation by horrid creatures. A group of humans called ‘The Stalkers’ once wielded power to hold back the horrors, but their sacrifice only delayed the inevitable.

Now, as the Night starts devouring every single glint of light, Vesper, a Stalker by right and daughter of a traitor, will travel a dying land trying to save the last embers of humanity. She hunts in a race against destiny, as the shadows lengthen both in the world and in her mind.

ENGAGE IN FAST-PACED DYNAMIC COMBAT
Dash through enemies while you unleash your combos, use your weapons or destroy them with your dark powers. You can switch between melee and ranged attack in quick succession: slashing enemies with your sword and then dashing away to use your ranged weapons, avoiding enemy attacks.

FACE INTENSE CHALLENGING BOSSES
Endure the ultimate challenge as you fight the ancient horrors of the Night that have been annihilating humanity over and over in intense boss battles. Learn their weak points, attack patterns and survive through the different combat phases as the battle gets more challenging and extreme.

UPGRADE AND CUSTOMIZE VESPER'S BUILD
Create your own build that will adapt not only to your preferred gameplay but also to particular bosses. Customize the upgrades of your arsenal and use the equipment that best suits your gameplay: Critical Damage, Life Steal, Poison, Close Combat, Firepower and more. Collect Sanguine vials, Crow Feathers, Moonstones and Noctilium to increase your stats and get ready to face the Night.

DISCOVER THE DARK WORLD OF MEDHRAM
Explore Medhram in a combination of action-adventure and dark fantasy lore. Survive huge dungeons full of traps, enemies, puzzles and challenges. Discover all kinds of locations, from ancient cathedrals and libraries of knowledge to lost kingdoms and devastated floating cities.

COMPLETE 'HUNTS' AS A MEMBER OF THE STALKERS
Accept a hunt at ‘Crow’s Nest’ and track down the dark beast, find where it hides and hunt the most powerful creatures of the Night. After every completed hunt you will get rewards that will increase your health and dark energy bar.

FIND SECONDARY CHARACTERS AND DISCOVER THEIR STORIES
Meet new characters and discover their tragic past and stories in a world that is on the brink of the abyss.

PLAY TO ADAPTED AND IMMERSIVE MUSIC
Immersive and adapted music to every moment, boss and location, with the collaboration of Hiroki Kikuta.
70010000066614.intro: Darkness never rests, and neither will you.
70010000066614.name: Hunt the Night

70010000100614.description:
“Um, please be the new manager of the cafe!”
 Fuwa Fuwa Cafe—a maid cafe tucked away in a quiet part of Nipponbashi, and where a wonderful encounter is about to take place...
 You, the protagonist, quit your job at an extremely toxic workplace and find yourself at a run-down maid cafe, where a cute maid named Shiro works.
 At first, you only agree to become the new manager because it conveniently met all your urgent needs, but soon the colorful maids Miyu, Favna, and Honoka join in. And as you spend time with them and meet the people of Electric Street, both you and the cafe will gradually liven up once more.
 
 Maid Cafe on Electric Street is a game set in Nipponbashi, the heart of Osaka’s otaku culture. This is a story-focused adventure game where you enjoy daily life at Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. Make yourself a cup of coffee, relax, and immerse yourself in a heartwarming story.
 
 
 ■4 Cute, Memorable Heroines
Enjoy voice-acted conversations with the four maids, all with distinct personalities.
 ♥Shiro (VA: Ikumi Hasegawa)
 A maid who loves Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. A huge otaku for anime and video games, she talks really fast when she’s gushing about the things she loves, and often splurges on merch without thinking whenever she visits an anime shop. A little clumsy, but works hard every day to become the cute maid she’s always wanted to be.
 
 ♥Miyu (VA: Ayasa Itou)
 A game otaku and gyaru with a big appetite. Loves both eating and cooking, and apparently really enjoys serving her cooking to customers at Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. Is actually Shiro's friend on the online game Magic Angel, so they knew each other before actually meeting in real life.
 
 ♥Favna (VA: Sayumi Suzushiro)
 A mysterious girl dressed in gothic Lolita fashion. Speaks in riddles and demands the protagonist become her familiar. She sometimes accidentally drops the edgy act when she's taken by surprise though, so maybe she's just got a serious case of chuunibyou...?
 
 ♥Honoka (VA: Yui Ishikawa)
 A girl with a Kansaiben dialect who works as a shrine maiden at her family shrine. Practically in charge of the shrine, she is reliable and very good at handling money! Is actually a doujin author...?
 
 ■The Daily Life with the Four Maids of Fuwa Fuwa Cafe
 As the manager of Fuwa Fuwa, you’ll live in Nipponbashi, Osaka and spend time with your favorite maid... or maids. Go shopping, watch a movie, go for karaoke, buy a present for a special someone... What you choose to do, and with whom, will affect the ending of the story.
 
 ■Make Fuwa Fuwa Cafe Famous!
As the manager, it's your job to run the cafe. Improve the maids' work skills, optimize their roles, and drive up profits. The money you earn can be spent on shopping, food, capsule toys and more!
 
 ■The Stunning Sights of Nipponbashi
 Visit stores you can find in the real Nipponbashi, such as Surugaya, Sofmap, Dragon Star, Super Potato, and Karaoke Rainbow, among the many others we've collaborated with.
 Go shopping by yourself or go on dates with the maids and enjoy life in otaku heaven. But don't stay out too late; you still have a cafe to run!
 
 ■Collectable Capsule Toys
 In this game, you can try to collect your favorite capsule toy series and experience that unique gacha thrill of not knowing what you're getting. Keep cranking those machines until you've collected them all!
 
 Other than capsule toys, there's more merch for you to collect, like video games, books, and figures. You can also decorate your room and watch as your collections reach completion!
70010000100614.intro:
Fuwa Fuwa, a maid cafe on its last legs.
By a twist of fate, you've become the boss.
Now turn things around with four adorable maids!
70010000100614.name: Maid Cafe on Electric Street

70010000110353.description:
Grow a variety of plants, trade them for unique furniture, and customize your garden in this calming mix of farming, puzzle-solving, and strategy. With no scores or time limits, it’s all about relaxing, experimenting, and letting your creativity bloom!

EVERYTHING IS A TOY IN TINY GARDEN!

Tiny Garden is a soothing, stress-free mix of farming, puzzles, and discovery - all inside a charming toy. Grow a variety of plants, from colourful vegetables to whimsical flowers, each with its own unique mechanics waiting to be uncovered. As your garden flourishes, trade your harvests for fun, toy furniture, and design your very own magical space.

A TOY WITH HISTORY

Before you got your hands on Tiny Garden, others have played with this toy. Through letters, you'll uncover a heartfelt story that reminds us that objects aren’t just things - they hold the traces of lives lived and stories shared. Each new discovery offers more than just a piece of furniture or a plant - it’s a glimpse into a deeper connection.

RELAX, DISCOVER, CREATE

Tiny Garden invites you to turn the crank, make things happen, and enjoy a wholesome but thoughtful experience. Each turn should be carefully considered - each decision and each new plant can reveal hidden surprises or unlock the next step in your garden’s evolution. There are no wrong choices here - just a relaxing journey where you can unwind, explore, and create without pressure.
70010000110353.intro: Tiny Garden lets you grow a pocket-sized garden inside a magical toy passed down through generations.
70010000110353.name: Tiny Garden

70010000112897.description:
At the Exit Lab, we’re running the Exit Skill Test to collect data on every visitor’s Exit Skill!
With your personal guide, the Examiner, leading the way, take on escape rooms crafted by our Lab researchers and boost that Exit Skill!

■ Five Rooms, Each with Its Own Unique Style
The five rooms prepared for you all feature totally different themes, so every escape feels fresh and exciting.
This software offers a “Beginner Course,” perfect for first-time escape players.

■ Explore & Solve Puzzles!
Each room hides tons of items and tricky gimmicks.
Exploring every nook and cranny is the first step to escaping!
Check anything that feels suspicious and crack the gimmicks blocking your path!
70010000112897.intro: Welcome to the Exit Lab, where we research your Exit Skill! Take on beginner-friendly escape challenges and level up your Exit Skill!
70010000112897.name: Exit Lab Beginner Level

70010000112903.description:
At the Exit Lab, we’re running the Exit Skill Test to collect data on every visitor’s Exit Skill!
With your personal guide, the Examiner, leading the way, take on escape rooms crafted by our Lab researchers and boost that Exit Skill!

■ Five Rooms, Each with Its Own Unique Style
The five rooms prepared for you all feature totally different themes, so every escape feels fresh and exciting.
This software offers an “Intermediate Course,” designed for players who’ve already gotten the hang of escape games.

■ Explore & Solve Puzzles!
Each room hides tons of items and tricky gimmicks.
Exploring every nook and cranny is the first step to escaping!
Check anything that feels suspicious and crack the gimmicks blocking your path!
70010000112903.intro: Welcome to the Exit Lab, where we research your Exit Skill! Take on intermediate escape challenges and level up your Exit Skill!
70010000112903.name: Exit Lab Intermediate Level

70010000112908.description:
At the Exit Lab, we’re running the Exit Skill Test to collect data on every visitor’s Exit Skill!
With your personal guide, the Examiner, leading the way, take on escape rooms crafted by our Lab researchers and boost that Exit Skill!

■ Five Rooms, Each with Its Own Unique Style
The five rooms prepared for you all feature totally different themes, so every escape feels fresh and exciting.
This software offers an “Advanced Course,” filled with tough and satisfying puzzles.

■ Explore & Solve Puzzles!
Each room hides tons of items and tricky gimmicks.
Exploring every nook and cranny is the first step to escaping!
Check anything that feels suspicious and crack the gimmicks blocking your path!
70010000112908.intro:
Welcome to the Exit Lab, where we research your Exit Skill! Challenge advanced escape rooms
and aim for that Master rank!
70010000112908.name: Exit Lab Expert Level

70010000113545.description:
Get ready to fluff your brain and relax your heart, because this little sheep in a top hat is about to turn puzzle-solving into the cutest ritual of calm you’ve ever seen. Magic Sheep is a charming, slow-paced puzzle adventure where you push wooden barrels across peaceful gardens until each one rests perfectly on a marble pedestal. No pressure, no timer, only soft music, gentle thinking, and plenty of “oh, that was clever” moments.

Each level is a tiny diorama built with love. You study the layout, plan a clean path, slide through narrow passages, avoid blocking yourself, and decide the perfect order to move each barrel. If something goes wrong, no worries at all. Undo takes you back one step, Restart lets you rethink the whole puzzle, and the atmosphere stays quiet and comforting from start to finish.

Across 30 handcrafted stages set between two biomes, the bright Summer and the cosy Autumn, you’ll enjoy warm colours, relaxing scenery, and puzzles that grow more satisfying as you progress. Finishing a level fills the screen with a cheerful little jingle, rewarding your clever route and inviting you to the next peaceful challenge.

Magic Sheep is perfect for players who love cosy visuals, gentle strategy, and the joy of solving puzzles at their own pace, all in the company of the happiest sheep in a top hat.
70010000113545.intro: A Cosy Puzzle of Barrels and Marble Charms
70010000113545.name: Magic Sheep

70010000116813.description:
A roguelite campaign where every run reshuffles the levels, keeping the action fresh and unpredictable.

Upgradeable ships, unlockable weapons, and skill trees that let you craft your own path to becoming an ace pilot.

Massive bosses, dynamic environments, and intense battles across space, air, and sea.

A dazzling arsenal: unleash power beams, multi-missile barrages, and even a nuke strike.

Train with a renegade crew of elite pilots using cutting-edge VR tech. Complete their missions, boost your Overdrive, and unlock story-rich conversations that reveal their pasts—and yours.
70010000116813.intro: Embark on an action-packed adventure in this on-rails space shooter. Master your ship, upgrade your skills, and protect the federation from an imminent threat.
70010000116813.name: FUR Squadron Phoenix

70010000118336.description: Relax and engage your mind with these relaxing logic puzzles. Solve the number clues to reveal hidden pixel art pictures. Solving each row and column brings you closer to the final image. Enjoy the perfect blend of calm and challenge. A lot unique puzzles await you. They're perfect for a quick break or a long session. Train your brain and find your inner peace.
70010000118336.intro: Take a breather and challenge your brain with these calming logic puzzles
70010000118336.name: Picronix 2

70010000080990.description:
App includes:
- A digital artbook featuring background art and illustrations from the making of Tales of Berseria Remastered.
- A digital soundtrack where players can listen to in-game BGM tracks.

*The Digital Art Book & Soundtrack is a separate application from the main game.
70010000080990.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered - Digital Artbook & Soundtrack

70010000081381.description:
Tales of Berseria returns with enhanced graphics and optimized gameplay!

Engage in the ultimate quest for self-discovery, remastered for the first time. The sacred kingdom awaits the arrival of its savior, and a lone woman named Velvet is marked by traumatic deceit.. Join Velvet on her journey for vengeance, along with her cast of eccentric companions, as they sail through the archipelago which comprises the kingdom of Midgand.

• A Tale of Emotion Versus Reason
Let emotions guide your destiny, or maintain order with the power of reason. Witness the eternal struggle between the head and the heart as Velvet is challenged to stand by her convictions while the world around her compresses into a system of order.

• An Exhilarating Combat System
Freely choose Artes to suit your playstyle and perform a variety of combos. Collect enemy Souls to unleash a barrage of attacks for a thrilling battle experience.

• A Modern, High-Quality Retelling
Useful features like destination markers and the ability to disable enemy encounters make traversing the islands of Midgand all the more enticing. Visit the famous Grade Shop from the game's opening. Get a smooth play experience only found in this remaster!

• Access DLC from the First Iteration
This version features several DLC from the original 2016 version. A treasure trove of content awaits you, such as outfits for your characters from the previous Tales Of games along with useful equipment for your travels.

*A Deluxe Edition is also available. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
70010000081381.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered

70010000099536.description:
A ruinous cataclysm unleashed by a tormented god descended the world of Talamhel into perpetual night. The hourglass of time was shattered and its essence poured across the land, creating an endless sea of sand. The once-flourishing world of Talamhel became a putrid lesion of its former glory and those who called it home are now husks of corruption--violent, undying, unyielding soldiers of death. 

But Talamhel is not lost--not yet. 

For generations, the righteous few have endured. You are one of those few.
